description:
godoc: remove dependency of syscall

On app-engine, we cannot import syscall.
The respective constants are already defined
elsewhere for the same reason.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0eaf2652c608 ***

godoc: remove dependency of syscall

On app-engine, we cannot import syscall.
The respective constants are already defined
elsewhere for the same reason.

R=r, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5036042

subject: code review 5036042: godoc: remove dependency of syscall
